title: FeSCN equil. - what can be concluded from large K

content.question:
Fe3+(aq) + SCN-(aq) ⇄ Fe(SCN)2+(aq)
For the reaction represented above, the value of the equilibrium constant, Keq, is 240 at 25°C. From this information, correct deductions about the reaction at 25°C include which of the following?

The reaction is quite rapid.

The product is favored over the reactants at equilibrium.

The reaction is endothermic.

skill.text: 6.D: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using chemical principles or laws, or using mathematical justification.
